snippet: Rory McIlroy leads the Honda Classic by two shots after three rounds. For the second consecutive week, he can ascend to No. 1 in the world with a victory.
abstract: Rory McIlroy takes third-round lead at the Honda Classic by two shots after three rounds; for the second consecutive week, McIlroy can ascend to No. 1 in the world with a tournament victory.
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy leads the Honda Classic by two shots after three rounds. For the second consecutive week, he can ascend to No. 1 in the world with a victory.

headline.seo: McIlroy Has a Second Chance to Move to No. 1
headline.main: Another Sunday Offers Another Chance for McIlroy to Claim No. 1 Ranking
headline.print_headline: Another Sunday Offers Another Chance for McIlroy to Claim No. 1 Ranking
